system.description:
The Berserker excells when in a frenzy and it now has the following changes:

  • When the Barbarian’s Rage exceeds the Frenzy threshold they can choose automatically fail the WILLPOWER SAVE and enter the Frenzy.

  • Instead of the closest creature, they target the closest enemy creature.

  • While the Barbarian still has to perform as many MEELE MARTIAL ATTACK as possible against the target, they don’t have to use the Resentful Strike Class Maneuver.

  • The first Class Maneuvers they perform during their turn costs 1 Rage less.

requirements.otherRequirements: Barbarian Class, Cosmic Rage I Perk or Elemental Rage I Perk not selected
